page.title: 12The Lydney Town Youth Tattoo
page.content: On Saturday,29th.June the sixth annual Lydney Youth Tattoo took place in Bathurst Park. The tattoo is for the youth of the district to enjoy themselves, help their organisations and also this year the "Save the Children" fund. About twenty groups took part such as Guides,A.T.C.,Judo Club and Playgroups. The Tattoo began with a procession through the town and on to the Park. After the opening by the Mayor there was a Mini Olympics with races for all ages including wheelbarrow and chariot racing. This was followed by a knock out soccer competition and a display by the Judo Club. Whilst this was going on people were able to go around the large number of stalls arranged around the ground with things to sell and compete for. It was very enjoyable afternoon.
